Title: Heart Of Winter
Plot: While on a hunting trip outside of Jericho, Jake, Stanley and Mimi find themselves in a dangerous situation when they run into some strangers.  Meanwhile, Hawkins realizes that his family is in danger because of him. Emily and Roger work on their relationship.
GuestStars: April D. Parker, Siena Goines, Darby Stanchfield, Christopher Dinh, Cari Zoch, Chris Foreman, Ron Bottitta, Christopher Weihl
